page.title: 10CARLTON BUSES
page.content: {Wallingwells}does not have a bus service.{East Midland}buses run through{Letwell}four times with two services, the 145 and 147. They run from{Worksop}to{Maltby}then to Doncaster. The{Doncaster}bus route only started just before Christmas 1984.The 147 crosses the border from{ {Nottinghamshire}to{Yorkshire}so travellers have to get off the{ {East midland}bus at{Maltby}and change to a South Yorkshire bus to Rotherham.The{South Yorkshire}buses are much cheaper than the {Nottinghamshire}buses because the{ {South Yorkshire Council subsidize the {fares.}Three buses go through{Carlton {they are number 4,22 and 36}number{4 {runs 17}times a day 22 runs 16 times a day and 7 on Sunday and 36 runs 15 times a day.In our area more people travel by car than by bus.
